name: xfce4-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Core libraries and applications for the Xfce4 desktop environment

dependencies.name: libxfce4util
dependencies.description: Libxfce4util common non-GTK+ utilities among the Xfce applications.

dependencies.name: tumbler
dependencies.description:
Tumbler is a D-Bus service for applications to request thumbnails for
XFCE4

dependencies.name: xfce4-appfinder
dependencies.description: Program to find and launch installed applications for XFCE4

dependencies.name: xfce4-settings
dependencies.description:
Daemon, manager, and editor to centralize the configuration management
for XFCE4

dependencies.name: xfconf
dependencies.description: xfconf - Configuration Storage System for XFCE4

dependencies.name: xfdesktop
dependencies.description: Xfdesktop is a desktop manager for the Xfce Desktop Environment.

dependencies.name: xfwm4
dependencies.description: xfwm4 is the window manager for Xfce
